context.commit_message:
Add multi-port optimization roadmap and universal guide

- Created comprehensive roadmap for optimizing multi-port architecture
- 5-phase implementation plan: lifecycle management, connection pools, port management, monitoring, performance
- Target: 70-80% resource reduction while maintaining perfect isolation
- Universal instructional guide covering all phases with complete code examples
- Organized documentation into roadmaps/ and instructional/ directories
- Moved MCP guide to instructional/ directory for better organization
